players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Alice looks suspicious. I think she's the mafia and we should vote for her."
You: "Diana, that's just a guess. We should discuss Bob; he hasn't said anything yet."
You: "I still think we should look at Bob. He's not speaking up, which is suspicious."
Diana: "I stand by my claim—Alice is the mafia. We can't afford to waste time on Bob; let's vote her out to end this."
